=== Ubuntu Hardy Heron 8.04 LTS ===
Hardy Heron 8.04 LTS is the eighth release of the Ubuntu Operating System.

Hardy 8.04.x is supported on the desktop and will continue to receive updates until April 2011 and April 2013 for server installations.

=== Long Term Service ===
''LTS'' stands for ''Long Term Support'': this version of Ubuntu is supported for 3 years on the desktop and 5 years on the server.

=== Releases ===
* Ubuntu 8.04.4 LTS - January 28 2010
* Ubuntu 8.04.3 LTS - July 16 2009
* Ubuntu 8.04.2 LTS - January 22 2009
* Ubuntu 8.04.1 LTS - July 3 2008
* Ubuntu 8.04 LTS - April 24 2008
